text:
I learned the next year, in a particular context, the professional insertion. I would like to introduce you this thematic.
It could concern so much people, for exemple a foreign people who arrive in Paris and decide to find a professional way.
Or people would just change their actual profession. Those people need some helps by a professional who introduce them all the issues that could take.
It's very recurrent to ask some advice for your orientation but in the case of a professional insertion you will be follow in each steps until your final choice.
I think that's very important for people to be follow before to take decisive choices. There is so much informations and formations, I understand when someone is lost in that   information waves. I hope that it will be easier to have access from advicer or to choose directly the good way to make what you like. But for the last, It seems impossible for the moment or very not usual.
By the way, I choose this formation because I was follow by professional who inspire myself in my carreer choice. That's why today, I'm trying to understand how the school system works and how could it be better for many people ? I would like to improve myself in different topics like communication, write expression, or in different languages. And I hope that I could help some foreign people to choose their carreer too.
